Reviews.Title: Canon Rebel SL1 Review
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: I first bought this camera for myself. I had a stroke and the other cameras were too heavy to hold for longer than one or two photos. I simply love this camera. It is exactly what I was looking for. The photos are clear and sharp and the lower weight was a fit for me. In fact, I liked it so much that I bought this one for my daughter for Christmas. She called me after she received it and said she loved the camera. She especially liked the touch screen and the photos did not need Photoshop work afterwards.

Reviews.Title: Awesome DSLR!
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: I have owned this Canon SL1 for about a month now, and I love it!  It is very easy to use, and you can quickly access all the settings that a seasoned photographer will ever need with ease.  Extremely happy that I bought it!

ProductInfo.Features:
18.0MP APS-C CMOS Sensor
DIGIC 5 Image Processor
3.0" Clear View II Touchscreen LCD
ISO 100-12800, Expandable to 25600
Full HD 1080 Video with Continuous AF
4.0 fps Continuous Shooting
9-Point AF System
Compact and Lightweight; Weighs 0.8 lb
EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS STM Lens
EF 75-300mm f/4.0-5.6 III Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel SL1 18.0 MP CMOS Digital SLR with 18-55mm EF-S IS STM Lens + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Telephoto Zoom Lens
